Note: if "Save as" is "/home/toto/myprefix_", the plots will be saved as:
- /home/toto/myprefix_plot_1_azth=0_dip=0.png
- /home/toto/myprefix_plot_2_azth=45_dip=14.png
- /home/toto/myprefix_all_directions.png
If files with such names exit, they will be overwritten...

Directions are defined by a vector (x,y,z)
For example (1,1,0) is the 45degrees line in the (X,Y) plane. Units are "number of grid cells" (hence x, y and z are integers)
